name: FPS Test Project
description:
This is a First Person Shooter game I made for College, it contains six weapons, one of which is a melee weapon.

Shooting Weapons work by shooting with the left mouse button and reloading using the R key. The Sniper rifle can be scoped in using right click and the sword doesn't shoot, but still attacks using left mouse button.

Item Pickups (Ammo and Health) are picked up by walking over them, switches can be turned on/off by looking at them (indicated by middle dot turning red) and pressing E. Switches are red when off and green when on. A specific combination will open a door.

Page has WebGL version that can be played in browser or downloadable ZIP that can be played on Windows.
